item.value: package java_assignment3;\R\Rimport java\.util\.Scanner;\R\Rpublic class intersection_4 \{\R\R\tpublic static void takeInput\(\)\t\{\R\t\tScanner s = new Scanner\(System\.in\);\R\t\tSystem\.out\.println\("Enter the size of array 1"\);\R\t\tint size1 = s\.nextInt\(\);\R\t\tint array1\[\] = new int\[size1\];\R\R\t\tSystem\.out\.println\("Enter the elements"\);\R\t\tfor\(int i = 0;i < size1;i\+\+\)\t\{\R\t\t\tarray1\[i\] = s\.nextInt\(\);\R\t\t\}\R\t\tSystem\.out\.println\("Enter the size of array 2"\);\R\t\tint size2 = s\.nextInt\(\);\R\t\tint array2\[\] = new int\[size2\];\R\t\tSystem\.out\.println\("Enter the elements"\);\R\t\tfor\(int j = 0;j < size2;j\+\+\)\t\{\R\t\t\tarray2\[j\] = s\.nextInt\(\);\R\t\t\}\R\t\tintersection\(array1,array2\);\R\t\t//\t\tSystem\.out\.println\(array\[index\]\);\R\R\t\}\R\R\tpublic static void intersection\(int a\[\],int b\[\]\)\t\{\R\t\tint array\[\] = new int\[10\];\R\t\tint index = 0;\R\t\tfor\(int i = 0;i < a\.length;i\+\+\)\t\{\R\t\t\tfor\(int j = 0;j < b\.length;j\+\+\)\t\{\R\t\t\t\tif\(a\[i\] == b\[j\]\)\t\{\R\t\t\t\t\tarray\[index\] = b\[j\];\R\t\t\t\t\tindex\+\+;\R\t\t\t\t\}\R\t\t\t\telse\t\{\R\t\t\t\t\treturn;\R\t\t\t\t\}\R\t\t\t\}\R\t\t\t//\t\t\tSystem\.out\.println\("no\. are: " \+ array\[index\]\);\R\t\t\}\R\t\t//\t\treturn array;\R\t\}\R\tpublic static void main\(String\[\] args\) \{\R\t\ttakeInput\(\);\R\t\t//\t\t\t\tSystem\.out\.println\(array\[index\]\);\R\t\}\R\R\}\R
